heroSection.heading: The Next Generation of Store Intelligence
heroSection.subtext: Leverage AI to analyze customer behavior, optimize shelves, streamline payments, and enhance ads. Gain deep store insights for game-changing business decisions!

feature.description: Unlock powerful tools to enhance customer insights, streamline operations, and boost profitability.

feature1.title: Realtime Alert
feature1.description: Send instant alerts via email, SMS, or dashboard when critical events are detected in your store such as long checkout waiting times, high shelf empty ratio, customer interest detected

feature2.title: Dashboard
feature2.description: Provides role-based dashboards with KPIs that matter from operations to marketing, and can be tailored to your critical business needs. Access actionable insights across single or multiple stores, all in one place

howGestore.heading: How Gestore help retailers achieve business success in brick-and-mortar store?
howGestore.subtext: Support your business strategy with critical KPIs powered by AI camera data from checkout areas, shelves, and marketing zones. You can act faster, stock smarter, and sell better.

useCase1.heading: Service Waiting Time
useCase1.subtext: Enhancing customer experience by reducing waiting times.

feature1.title: Data-driven dashboard report
feature1.detail1: Report the total time customers need for services: payment, consultation, waiting to be consulted...
feature1.detail2: Report the percentage of customers leaving the waiting area without making a payment or before receiving consultation

feature2.title: AI feature
feature2.detail1: Customize the definitions of the relevant business metric KPIs according to the type of service time
feature2.detail2: Identify customers and staff, actions taken for consultation, actions for waiting
feature2.detail3: Customize the 2D visualisation between the actual layout and the layout on the app

useCase2.heading: Optimising Media Marketing
useCase2.subtext: How many people are interested in the marketing content, what is the average attention span, what is the interest and age and demographics of the interested audience?

feature1.title: Data-driven dashboard report
feature1.detail1: Report dashboard based on the effectiveness of each Marketing content
feature1.detail2: Report on customers footfall ratio: Where customers are, which advertising content they pay attention to, for how long, customer attributes...

feature2.title: AI feature
feature2.detail1: Customize the definitions of business metric KPIs corresponding to the type of Marketing content
feature2.detail2: Identify customer, analyse customer characteristics (gender, age...)
feature2.detail3: Identify customer interest through facial direction, eye gaze...
feature2.detail4: Customize the 2D mapping between the actual layout and the layout on the app

useCase3.heading: Empty Shelves Monitoring
useCase3.subtext: Prevent 50% potential lost sale by product empty on shelves.

feature1.title: Data-driven dashboard report
feature1.detail1: Report real-time stock shortages on each shelf
feature1.detail2: Report the average time required to recover stock after a shortage alert
feature1.detail3: Report the number of customers visiting the shelves when stock is low

feature2.title: AI feature
feature2.detail1: Customize the definition of the item type to be monitored
feature2.detail2: Identify shortages for vegetables, fresh product, etc, by quantity, by actual volume of goods
feature2.detail3: Customize the 2D visualisation between the actual layout and the layout on the app

reasons.title: Why retailers choose Gestore
reasons.description: See what people from all around the world are saying about Gestore.

reason1.title: One platform - 360-degree view of customer behavior and store operation.
reason1.description: One platform - 360-degree view of customer behavior and store operation.

reason2.title: Don’t just see what’s happening in your store, you act on it in real time via alert
reason2.description: Don’t just see what’s happening in your store, you act on it in real time via alert

reason3.title: Pre-built dashboards with existing KPIs asset are easily customized for your critical business goal.
reason3.description: Pre-built dashboards with existing KPIs asset are easily customized for your critical business goal.

reason4.title: Offers fixed and usage-based pricing for cost optimization.
reason4.description: Offers fixed and usage-based pricing for cost optimization.

reason5.title: Easy integration into your existing video camera systems.
reason5.description: Easy integration into your existing video camera systems.

reason6.title: Gestore isn’t just a demo - it's a production-ready platform fastening deployment time.
reason6.description: Gestore isn’t just a demo - it's a production-ready platform fastening deployment time.

howItWork.heading: How does it work
howItWork.subtext: Automatically collect camera data, analyze customer behavior and store conditions, and provide actionable insights for optimized management
howItWork.step1: Connect store cameras to the platform
howItWork.step2: Train models to match store operations
howItWork.step3: Dashboard and alerts ready after days of data collection
